name: Triple White Makers: Zesty The Game
name_original: Triple White Makers: Zesty The Game
description:
All art was made by us, nothing taken from the internet.

Coding tutorials used:  Dragifon and  BlaizeArtz.

"Spirit : Many years ago, there were three kingdoms that lived in peace and harmony, until one day they got greedy, and the land they owned wasn’t enough."
"Spirit : They waged war upon each other, a long, brutal and chaotic war lasting to this day. You have been chosen, brave fighter, to defend our land and defeat the other kingdoms!"
"Fighter: How do I defeat the other kingdoms?"
 "Spirit: You must search the land that was once ours and find attackers from the other kingdoms. You can control direction with the arrow keys. Once you confront them, you must battle them to the death!"
 "Fighter: How do I fight the enemies?"
"Spirit: You will be presented with a range of combat options and must strategically use attacks or defend yourself. You can select an attack by clicking on it, but make sure to play to your strengths and keep an eye on your health!"
 "Fighter: Okay, I’m ready!"
"Spirit: Good luck, fighter."
